author: Legoman1001
title: A mini-Classic set done right
review:
I really like this set, everything is oriented around a domestic scene which is appropriate to Ikea and goes along with the origins of Lego. Along those lines you also get the classic smiley minifigs which is what hooked me in the first place, along with the basic legs and torso which is a welcome relief from minifigs with overabundant "personality."

In my mind this is what a Classic set should be: colours and pieces based around a domestic scene first and foremost. All of the colours and pieces can easily find a purpose during free building, none of them are too odd or niche. The ratio of pieces: windows, minifig accessories, bricks and plates is well-balanced for lots of possibilities.

Being only 200 pieces, it's obviously limited, but it's great for what it is and not too pricey.
